p: Rats treated with HCl/ethanol showed marked histological changes in the gastric mucosa with disruption and exfoliation of the superficial gastric epithelium, vacuolization, and necrosis in the superficial mucosal layer associated with gastric lesions ( Figure 3a,b). Pretreatment with IFE at doses of 100 and 300 mg/kg and Stillen at 300 mg/kg prevented the congestion and swelling of the gastric mucosal epithelium ( Figure 3câ€“h).
